name: Jump'N'Robo
description:
A 3D platformer made in Unreal using Blueprints. Jump across the platforms and collect golden spheres as you make your way to the exit portal. But try not to fall off. 

Credit where credit is due:  

* Coin sound effect by NenadSimic  on OpenGameArt. 

* Robot jump Sound effect by Gobusto on OpenGameArt. 

* Robot theme music by Umplix on OpenGameArt

* Level 1 & 4 Theme-Futuristic Resources- by section31 on OpenGameArt. 

* Level 2 & 5 Theme-Up in the Sky-by You're Perfect Studio on OpenGameArt.  

* Level 3 theme- Factory Ambience- by YD on OpenGameArt 

* Everything else created by me
